results.title: Impact of Diabetes and Metformin Use on Enteropancreatic Neuroendocrine Tumors: Post Hoc Analysis of the CLARINET Study
results.text_hl: Impact of @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@Diabetes@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ Use on @<m>DISEASE_Gastro_enteropancreatic_neuroendocrine_tumor</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C535650 @@@Enteropancreatic Neuroendocrine Tumors@@@: Post Hoc Analysis of the CLARINET Study

citations.NLM: Pusceddu S, Vernieri C, Di Maio M, Prinzi N, Torchio M, Corti F, Coppa J, Buzzoni R, Di Bartolomeo M, Milione M, Regnault B, Truong Thanh XM, Mazzaferro V, de Braud F. Impact of Diabetes and Metformin Use on Enteropancreatic Neuroendocrine Tumors: Post Hoc Analysis of the CLARINET Study Cancers (Basel). 2021 Dec 23;14(1):. PMID: 35008233

results.title: Neuroendocrine tumors and diabetes mellitus: which treatment and which effect.
results.text_hl: On the other hand, the effects of anti-@DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ treatment, like @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Sulfonylurea_Compounds @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013453 @@@sulfonylureas@@@, @CHEMICAL_Thiazolidinediones @CHEMICAL_MESH:D045162 @@@thiazolidinediones@@@, ipeptidyl-peptidase-4 inhibitors, @GENE_GLP1R @GENE_2740 @@@Glucagon-like peptide-1 receptor@@@ agonists, and @GENE_SLC5A2 @GENE_6524 @@@Sodium-glucose cotransporter-2@@@ inhibitors on @DISEASE_Neuroendocrine_Tumors @DISEASE_MESH:D018358 @@@NET@@@ are unclear. Recently, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ has been investigated in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Gastro_enteropancreatic_neuroendocrine_tumor</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C535650 @@@gastroenteropancreatic NET@@@ resulting in improved progression free survival suggesting a potential antineoplastic role.

citations.NLM: Mazzilli R, Zamponi V, Mancini C, Giorgini B, Golisano B, Mikovic N, Pecora G, Russo F, Martiradonna M, Paravani P, Prosperi D, Faggiano A. Neuroendocrine tumors and diabetes mellitus: which treatment and which effect. Endocrine. 2025 Jan 3;():. PMID: 39752043
